text: Luchy Donalds (born 28 May 1993) is a Nigerian actress known for her debut movie, The Investigator. She was born in Owerri, Imo State. She had her elementary education at Mount Camel Premier School before proceeding to Tansian University, Umunya in Anambra State where she got her bachelor's degree in microbiology. Donalds has acted Seed of Sorrow, Royal Sibling, Lust in Marriage, Marriage Bride Price, Songs and Sorrows, Crazy Fighter, Trust no one, Billionaire and his Blind Wives, Soul on Fire, The Classic Ladies, Chef Augusta, Cheating in Marriage. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1993 births Category:Nigerian actors Category:Movie actors Category:Imo State
title: Luchy Donalds
